answerText: NMR or Nuclear Magnetic Resonance[10] The peaks in NMR are positioned according to this value, which is the normalized resonant frequency of a molecule. The hydrogens in TMS by definition have value zero and it is measured in parts per million.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 12 | 9 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Spin-spin coupling causes multiplet peaks to occur in this technique, and more advanced versions of this technique make use of through-space coupling via the Overhauser effect. For 10 points each: [10] Name this form of spectroscopy in which a strong magnetic field causes atoms to spin at a particular frequency, which can then be measured. It comes in proton and carbon-13 varieties.
